skill_e.tooltip: Deals ?% of the target's maximum health (+?) as magic damage and knocks them back a short distance. (? Maximum Damage against monsters)

Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks.
